sentences.cn: …他们的继父迈克尔• 迪斯坦普尔男爵

sentences.en: Are you a friend of Baron Wendleton's?
sentences.cn: 你是温尔顿男爵的朋友 吗 ?

sentences.en: He has the dubious distinction of being the first railway baron to go bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 他担着首位破产铁路大亨的名声,这也算是种荣誉吧.

sentences.en: He was created Baron of Banthorp.
He was created Baron of Bunthorp.
Henry Ford was an automobile baron.
sentences.cn: 亨利·福特是一位汽车业巨头.

sentences.en: I once carried a letter to a baron of that sort.
sentences.cn: 有一次，我送一封信给一个男爵，他便是这样的。

sentences.en: In the County of Yorkshire in the north part of England there lived a baron.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰北部的约克郡,住着一位男爵.

sentences.en: Isn't it nice to have a wicked Baron just as in olden times?
sentences.cn: 就象古时候那样,现在还有个缺德的男爵,多有意思?

sentences.en: One man deserves credit for starting our modern Games: Baron Pierre de Coubertin, a French sportsman.
sentences.cn: 现代奥运会的兴起应归功于法国运动家皮埃尔,德-库贝坦男爵.

sentences.en: One of his friends is a steel baron.
sentences.cn: 他的一位朋友是钢铁大王.

sentences.en: That old baron got only what he deserved.
sentences.cn: 那位老男爵也不过是自作自受自遭殃.

sentences.en: The baron became increasingly heated over the hypocrisy of it all.
sentences.cn: 男爵对整件事的虚伪感到越来越生气。

sentences.en: The baron lived in a strong castle.
sentences.cn: 男爵住在一座坚固的城堡中.

sentences.en: The Baron was in high good humour.
The oil baron was killed by an assassin.
sentences.cn: 这位石油大亨被刺客杀害了.

sentences.en: They looked through her possessions and found the Baron's letter to his brother.
sentences.cn: 她们翻遍了她的东西,结果发现了男爵给他兄弟的信.

words.tran_cn: 男爵夫人；女男爵；（欧洲某些国家）男爵之女
男爵领地；男爵爵位；大片私有土地

trans.tran_cn: 男爵，大亨，巨头，贵族，脊肉
trans.tran_en: a man who is a member of a low rank of the British nobility or of a rank of European nobility
